name: The Unquiet Grave
description:
The Unquiet Grave is an interactive fiction game where you take on the role of Catherine Earnshaw from Emily Brontë's Wuthering Heights. With a customizable appearance, name, gender, and personality, take on the challenges of life for a young child on the lonely moors as you grow to adulthood. Navigate relationships with the brooding Heathcliff and the gentle Edgar, and forge your own path through life – and death.

The game covers the section of the novel until the original Cathy's death, as well as parts of her potential afterlife. Whether your protagonist meets the same fate, or defies the stars and society in making a different choice, only you can decide.

The game is still being developed more, so I would deeply appreciate any feedback you have to give! Please leave feedback and bug reports in the comment section below. Thank you for playing!
